originalText.text: I had an amazing experience! Angela was sweet and knew exactly what I needed. She has been doing hair her whole life and that was very clear. My hair was in need of some major TLC (I haven't gotten a cut or color in two years). I will definitely be going back and recommending them to my friends.

originalText.text: Genuinely the only place I will ever go to get my hair done ever again. I‚Äôve been seeing Ava for about a year and I‚Äôve never had a stylist I trust more. She does amazing extensions and my hair has grown so much during this process (which, if you know anything about extensions, is crazy ‚Äî a lot of the time they can damage your hair). I always feel so so amazing after I see her, plus she‚Äôs funny and totally gets my vision. All the other stylists are also cheerful and warm! Can‚Äôt recommend enough. She has quite literally changed my life.

originalText.text: I‚Äôve been seeing Ava for the past year now. I have naturally curly hair (probably about type 3A-3B). I had a bad haircut before I met Ava and she fixed it right up. As a curly girl it is very hard to trust someone with my hair, but from the minute I met Ava I felt a sense of relief. Her also having curly hair helped because she could relate to a lot of my struggles of finding someone who knows how to actually do my hair. I am not even from nyc but I travel to Ava to cut/color my hair because I won‚Äôt put my hair in anyone else‚Äôs hands. Since seeing her my hair grows out to be so healthy and long. I also never trusted anyone to put color in my hair in fear of my curl pattern being ruined, but  after meeting Ava I knew that it takes the right stylist to do it right without messing up your hair no matter what type of hair you have. I highly recommend Ava no matter what kind of hair you have. She‚Äôs a funny, kind, and talented person. You won‚Äôt be disappointed!

originalText.text: I was in serious need of a haircut and decided to check out this salon and Lord, I'm so happy I did. Everyone was so attentive and helpful. Jennifer knew exactly what I needed and gave great recommendations for the appointment. Munni did an amazing job with the cut, color and style! She was patient, kind and took great care of my hair. She also has a beautiful personality. In addition to that,  they are reasonably priced and the service is amazing! I highly recommend this placeüëåüèæ

originalText.text: Long overdue review! I love salon West and hands down I will recommend anyone I know to come here. I have so much hesitation when it comes to my hair to the point that I only get my haircut done once or twice a month, even when I invest in my haircut I always have a bad experience but Salon West is hands down the first place that cut my hair PERFECTLY. The attention to detail and care is literally unmatched, also the people that work there Omg don‚Äôt get me started! Everyone is so kind and sweet, they also give you great tips on how to maintain your hair to keep it looking vibrant for as long as possible. I love all the ladies that work here and I already can‚Äôt wait to book my next appointment! Xoxo
